title: (x) very classy Sans Serif - Gloria {Akira}
content:
I love the way this sans serif pairs with a scripty brush font. I know what the brush font is, does anybody know what the sans serif is?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110414150459im_/http:/typophile.com/files/alpinescript_6107.jpg)

Thanks!

Al Abut  
--  
interaction designer, crimefighter  
 [http://alabut.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20110414150459/http:/alabut.com/ "http://alabut.com")  
 [http://twitter.com/alabut](http://web.archive.org/web/20110414150459/http:/twitter.com/alabut "http://twitter.com/alabut")  
--
author: alabut

comments.content: I think itâ€™s [Gloria](http://web.archive.org/web/20110414150459/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/gloria.php) by the same author as the script font, Charles Borges de Oliviera.
